title: Distrustful Employee
description: As a porter working at Xadme's Guild Hall, our relationship is characterized by a strong professional connection (StrengthScore: 131.25) but significant distrust (TrustScore: -3.37). The unpaid wages at his small warehouse business likely contribute to this negative sentiment, as I continue to fulfill my duties at the Porter Guild Hall despite apparent compensation issues elsewhere in his business operations.
